video_title: Quick Tips To Build Your Confidence - Dr Julie #shorts
transcript:
if you want to build your confidence i'm
a psychologist and here's three tips to
start you off number one take action you
can't convince yourself to feel more
confident by just thinking about it or
talking about it your brain learns
through experience so you have to start
doing the thing that you want to feel
more confident in number two accept that
you're not going to suddenly feel
confident overnight be willing to feel
vulnerable when you start out and trust
that it builds over time and number
three avoidance feeds anxiety so if you
want to feel more confident at something
do it as often as you possibly can
